Key Match Events: Mohammed Haris scored 28 runs off 11 balls with three sixes
Shadab Khan scored 52 runs off 22 balls with four sixes
Shadab Khan bowled the decisive over, removing Temba Bavuma and Aiden Markram
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam said, "Cricket is a funny game, we hope for the best"
Shadab Khan said, "Iâ€™ve maybe done like this in the PSL, but this is an international match so definitely this is the best"
Bavuma said, "It was disappointing with our batting and fielding, getting them five down then allowing them to get to that formidable score"
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mohammed Haris was put straight into the XI a day after being approved as an injury replacement for Fakhar Zaman
Others: Pakistan remained third-favourites to get one of the top two places in the group
South Africa still have their fate in their own hands, with their final match coming against last-placed Netherlands
